summary: "Fixes" a bug caused by USLEEP to the "Howl of the Pack" ability
descriptionHtml:
Howl of the Pack is a werewolf howl, that summons two werewolves to your aid. The Unofficial Skyrim patch, and the unofficial Skyrim legendary edition patch change it to one. I am not sure if this was intentional or not, but it's a change I personally disagree with. After all the description of the effect says "brothers" not brother. So I am fairly sure summoning two not one was intentional not a bug. This reverts the Howl to its original purpose, so it once again summons two pack members. 

Requires Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch
author: JamesThparker
